changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.attribute AS SELECT a.id, a.name, a.description, a.notes, a.pinned, a.inheritable, a.value_type, up.name AS updated_by, a.update_date FROM ruleform.attribute a JOIN ruleform.agency up ON a.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.attribute OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.attribute TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.attribute TO public;
